entry.title: BIP144: use of 1<<3 service bit
entry.summary: The BIP144 has been revised to match the implementation in #7910, according to recent updates. This information is essential for those who are interested in Bitcoin Improvement Proposals and want to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in this field. The 1 will be used as a reference in the future when discussing this topic. It is important to note that this revision will have an impact on how transactions are processed and verified in the Bitcoin network. For those interested in learning more about this topic, there are several links provided in the context that can be explored for further information.
